title: Purity in the Camp
summary: Numbers 5 gives laws about keeping the camp pure, including expelling the unclean, handling restitution for wrongs, and testing for marital unfaithfulness with the 'test of bitter water.'

faq.question: Why were the unclean removed from the camp?
faq.answer: To keep Godâ€™s dwelling place among His people holy.

faq.question: What was the test of the unfaithful wife?
faq.answer: A ritual involving bitter water to reveal whether a woman had been unfaithful to her husband.
